GitHub Discord

The OCaml Framework for Software Artisans

Riot is a framework to build fast and realiable I/O heavy applications
Get Started

What’s inside?

Fearless Refactoring

Writing your apps in OCaml helps you prototype quickly and refactor fearlessly.

Batteries Included

Riot aims to be a productive environment for building I/O heavy applications like web servers.

Multi-core from Day 1

Riot apps are multicore ready by default. Simply spawn many Riot processes and the engine will schedule them across all the available cores.

Faster than Fast

Riot ships with a purpose-built I/O engine to squeeze the every CPU cycle and make your apps blazing fast!

Friendly

All backgrounds and genders and experience levels are welcome and respected equally. Black lives matter. Trans rights are human rights. No nazi bullsh*t.
